title: 5 Agile Techniques To Help Avoid a CrowdStrike-Like Issue
author: David Eastman
description: We look at how the techniques of Agile can play a vital part in the discovery and confrontation of issues like the CrowdStrike controversy.
cntitle: 5 种敏捷技术，帮助避免 CrowdStrike 式问题
cndescription: 我们将探讨敏捷技术如何在发现和应对 CrowdStrike 争议等问题中发挥至关重要的作用。
